page.title: 05My day by Stephen age 9
page.content: At half past seven I got up,dressed in my old clothes and helped dad with the cows then I got changed had bacon and egg and a slice of toast and came to school by taxi.We had assembly all together and then maths.I did fractions and long multiplication.After playtime we did English and reading and after dinner I did some work on the Domesday survey.We did reading, handwork and rounders until 3.30 when the school taxi picked me up. I had tea, bread and jam and went to help on the farm. I played on my bike.At nine oclock I went in, had supper,watched television and went to bed at ten oclock.
